original_text: Do you not know that he who unites himself with a prostitute is one with her in body? For it is said, “The two will become one flesh.”
korean_text: 창녀와 합하는 자는 그와 한 몸인 줄을 알지 못하느냐 일렀으되 둘이 한 육체가 된다 하셨나니

sentences.original_text: that he who unites himself with a prostitute
is one with her in body?
sentences.korean_translation: 그 몸으로 그녀와 하나가 되는 것을

sentences.original_text: The two will become one flesh.
